## **Documentos** {#documentos .tabset}

<!--script for generating HORIZONTAL LINE-->
<hr style="height:2px;border-width:0;color:black;background-color:black">

```{r downloads, eval = has.downloads}
# initialize all sheets
abas <- readxl::excel_sheets("PPG/Downloads.xlsx")

# display each sheet in a tab
for (j in 1:length(abas)) {
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
  cat(paste0('### **', abas[j], '**'))
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
  downloads.raw <-
    readxl::read_excel("PPG/Downloads.xlsx",
                       sheet = abas[j],
                       col_types = c("text"))
  
  # replace the link by a tag
  Abrir <- matrix(NA, nrow = dim(downloads.raw)[1])
  colnames(Abrir) <- "Abrir"
  # add hyperlinks
  for (i in 1:dim(downloads.raw)[1]) {
    if (!is.na(downloads.raw[i, 3])) {
      Abrir[i] <-
        paste0('<a href="',
               downloads.raw[i, 3],
               '" target="_blank"',
               '>',
               "↗️" ,
               "</a>",
               sep = "")
    }
  }
  downloads <- cbind(downloads.raw[, -3], Abrir)

  # print table
  print(
    kable(downloads, align = "l", col.names = NULL, escape = FALSE) %>% kable_styling(
      bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"),
      full_width = T,
      position = "center"
    )
  )
  
  # print end of tab rows
  cat('<br><a style="float:right" href="#top"><b>Início &nbsp;</b>⬆️</a><br>')
}
```
